pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoDrops Original Menthol 42 Lozenges
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks VapoDrops Original Menthol lozenges soothes the throat, clears the nose. 

- Vicks VapoDrops temporarily relieves sore throat and blocked nose. It soothes the throat and clears the nose.
- For the throat: The proven Vicks medications soothes and cools irritated throats.
- For the nose: Vicks vapour action clears and cools nasal passages - fast.
- Available in 4 flavours: Original Menthol, Butter Menthol, Burst of Mint and Cooling Peppermint
- Standard sizes: 10 drops | 24 drops | 27 drops | 30 drops
- Now available in Mega Value Pack in 2 flavours - Original Menthol and Butter Menthol.


Vicks VapoDrops will quickly relieve the "throat tickle" that precedes a coughing fit and could prevent you from using your voice with confidence! The lozenges will help to soothes the throat and clears the nose. Feel the effect in seconds!

Size: 42 Lozenges

KEY FEATURES

• Temporarily relieves sore throat and blocked nose.
• For the throat: The proven Vicks medication soothes and cools irritated throats.
• For the nose: Vicks vapour action clears and cools nasal passages - fast.
• Soothes the throat, clears the nose

Warnings

Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Do not purchase if bag is open.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active Ingredients per lozenge: Menthol 10.6mg, Eucalyptus Oil 4.6mg

Contains: Glucose - Liquid and Sucrose

Directions

Take 1-2 lozenges every 2-3 hours as needed.

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Store below 30°C in a dry place.
